text: fighters exhibit some of the strangest
and most violent sexual behavior in all
of nature the female black widow spider
often attacks and eats the male right
after mating that provides more
nutrition for the eggs but scientists
studying the dark fishing spider very
common widespread species have found
something even more surprising the
females don't have to attack the male's
they die in their own the male finds a
female attaches himself to her inflates
a bulb at the end of his sexual organ
which is called a pedophile and
transfers his sperm but the bulb doesn't
deflate as it does in many other spiders
instead the male drained of bodily fluid
curls up and dies hanging lifeless from
the female and within a few minutes she
gobbles it
why this behavior evolved is next on the
list of research questions but the
pattern for the male's of the dark
fishing spider is clear live fast make
quick die young
